content.question:
Â© Werner Forman Archive/The Bridgeman Art Library

Nukuoro figures of Micronesia were made as abstract figures with smooth wood in order for them to

choices.label: represent the inner essence of the most powerful creator god
embody local deities and be honored with feathers, paint, and woven fiber decoration
depict guardians that protected agricultural crops during the growing season
portray young adults who have recently completed initiation ceremonies

content.answer: embody local deities and be honored with feathers, paint, and woven fiber decoration

topic.text: 9.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Pacific Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
